## Return Value

Shared process information agent for the process.

An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo] object is created the first time this method is invoked, and that same object is returned on each subsequent invocation.

# processInfo

**Type Property**

Returns the process information agent for the process.

## Declaration

```swift
class var processInfo: ProcessInfo { get }
```

## Return Value

Shared process information agent for the process.

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo] object is created the first time this method is invoked, and that same object is returned on each subsequent invocation.
title: processInfo
